newsAndUpdates.sectionDescription: Stay updated with the latest news, announcements, and behind-the-scenes content from blueREP.

articles.title: Auditions for Spring 2025 Production
articles.excerpt: We're excited to announce auditions for our upcoming spring production. All students are welcome to try out!

articles.title: Holiday Workshop Series
articles.excerpt: Join us for our special holiday workshop series featuring guest artists and industry professionals.

articles.title: Best Musical Production Award
articles.excerpt: We're proud to announce that our latest production has won the Best Musical Production Award!

articles.title: Vocal Training Workshop
articles.excerpt: Master the art of vocal performance with our intensive workshop led by professional vocal coaches.

articles.title: Behind the Scenes: Spring Awakening
articles.excerpt: Take a peek behind the curtains and discover the magic that went into creating our latest production.

articles.title: New Partnership with Local Theatre
articles.excerpt: We're thrilled to announce our new partnership with the Manila Theatre Guild for collaborative productions.

moments.sectionDescription: Captured memories from our past events and productions.

shows.title: Spring Awakening
shows.description: A powerful coming-of-age musical that explores the journey of self-discovery and the challenges of adolescence.

shows.title: Rent
shows.description: Jonathan Larson's groundbreaking musical about love, friendship, and living life to the fullest.

shows.title: Les Misérables
shows.description: Victor Hugo's epic tale of redemption, love, and revolution in 19th century France.

shows.title: Wicked
shows.description: The untold story of the witches of Oz, exploring friendship, love, and the nature of good and evil.

shows.title: Hamilton
shows.description: Lin-Manuel Miranda's revolutionary musical about the founding of America through hip-hop and R&B.

shows.title: The Phantom of the Opera
shows.imageAlt: The Phantom of the Opera 2021 Production
shows.description: Andrew Lloyd Webber's haunting tale of love, obsession, and the power of music.

shows.title: Chicago
shows.description: A razzle-dazzle musical about fame, fortune, and all that jazz in 1920s Chicago.

shows.title: Into the Woods
shows.description: Stephen Sondheim's magical musical that intertwines classic fairy tales with unexpected consequences.
